overview: The Latest from Paris takes place in New York's garment district, where business rivals Blogg and Littauer have been carrying on a feud for years. In the tradition of Romeo and Juliet, heroine Ann Dolan works for Blogg, while her sweetheart Joe Adams is employed by Littauer.
tagline: A PICTURE ABOUT THE ROMANCE AND THE HUMOR OF THE GIRL IN BUSINESS!
title: The Latest from Paris
